# The movement to the coal position (22.5, -14.5) was successful again. However, the persistent issue with the player position remaining at (0, 0) continues to hinder my ability to place the stone furnace.

# This indicates that there may be an underlying issue with the player position not updating correctly after movements. 

# To troubleshoot this, I will attempt to check the current player position to confirm if it has updated after my movements.

current_position = get_player_position()  # Retrieve the current player position
print(f'Current player position: {current_position}')  # Print the current position to debug the issue.
